message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $12000 to me. However, considering its significance to you, I am willing to offer it to you for $11000. This represents an outstanding opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a price that is slightly below its perceived value to you. Please let me know if this offer suits your needs and budget.
